/1
1111(2)	= 2^3 + 2^2 + 2^1 + 2^0 = 15
AB1(12)	= 10*12^2+11*12^1+1 	= 1573
705(8)	= 7*8^2+5				= 453
ABC(16)	= 10*16^2+11*16+12		= 2748

/2
1573,4(8)    = 1*8^3+5*8^2+7*8+3, 4*8^-1 					= 891,5
ABC,CBA(16)  = 10*16^2+11*16+12, 12*16^-1+11*16^-2+10*16^-3 = 2748,79541015625
1011,1101(2) = 2^3+2+1, 2^-1+2^-2+2^-4 						= 11,8125
0,4(8)       = 0, 4*8^-1									= 0,5

/3
(((1*8+2)*8+1)*8+0) = 648
((8*9+8)*9+8)		= 728
((10*16+13)*16+10)  = 2778

/4
87599 / 16 = 5474.9375 	15	F
5474 / 16 = 342.125		2	2
342 / 16 = 21.375		6	6
21 / 16 = 1.3125		5	5
1 / 16 = 0.0625			1	1
0 / 7

1234 / 7 = 176.285714286	2
176 / 7 = 25.1428571429		1
25 / 7 = 3.57142857143		4
3 / 7 = 0.42857142857		3
0 / 7 

/5
445 = 256+128+32+16+8+4+1 110111101

7294 / 8 = 911.75	6
911 / 8 = 113.875	7
113 / 8 = 14.125	1
14 / 8 = 1.75		6
1 / 8 = 0.125		1
0 / 8 

77875 / 3 = 25958.3333333	1
25958 / 3 = 8652.667		2
8652 / 3 = 2884				0
2884 / 3 = 961.33			1
961 / 3 = 320.33			1
320 / 3 = 106.667			2
106 / 3 = 35.33				1
35 / 3 = 11.667				2
11 / 3 = 3.667				2
3 / 3 = 1					0
1 / 3 =						1
0 / 3

/6
26.4375 = 11010,0111
(8)	32,34
